attributes.comment:
Please reconsider the increases proposed in USCIS 2006-0044.

Adoption can be an expensive adventure taken by individuals to form a loving
family. However, the additional expenses for the processing of the required US
government forms alone can make it impossible for some families to bear this
burden.

It is understood that costs to process these documents will increase over time,
but in 1985 the I-600/-600A cost $50.00, the N-565 was $15.00 and the N-600 was
$35.00. The extreme documentation fee increases for these forms are difficult to
understand.

This current round of proposed increases is severely out of line with the cost of
inflation since the last increase of 2005.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Lauren Spera
